    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Razstavljanje hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">Decomposing velocity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerlegende Geschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse de décomposition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade decomposing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità di decomposizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα αποσύνθεσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad de descomposición</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Hitrost delca v prostoru je podana po komponentah, s pomočjo pitagorovega izreka izračunaj skupno hitrost.</string>
            <string language="en">Calculate the velocity of a particle with given velocity components with the use of Pythagorean theorem.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hitrost</string>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">komponenta hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">speed component</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pitagorov izrek</string>
            <string language="en">pythagorean theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Errechnen Sie die Geschwindigkeit eines Partikels
mit gegebenen Geschwindigkeit Bestandteilen mit dem Gebrauch von 
pythagoräischem Theorem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calculez la vitesse d'une particule avec les 
composants donnés de vitesse avec l'utilisation du théorème 
pythagorien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calcule a velocidade de uma partícula com 
componentes dados da velocidade com o uso do theorem pythagorean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcoli la velocità di una particella con i dati
componenti di velocità con l'uso del teorema pythagorean.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογίστε την ταχύτητα ενός μορίου με τα δεδομένα 
τμήματα ταχύτητας με τη χρήση του πυθαγορικού θεωρήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcule la velocidad de una partícula con los 
componentes dados de la velocidad con el uso del teorema pythagorean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit Bestandteil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pythagoräisches Theorem</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
